channel.title: 3mpwr App - Curated Disability News
channel.description: Daily curated news on disability rights, accessibility, and benefits across Canada

item.title: U.S. Senate passes non-binding vote against Trump’s tariffs on Canada
item.description: Sen. Tim Kaine of Virginia, the Democrat pushing the resolutions, said that higher prices caused by tariffs would force Republicans to break with Trump.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Job vacancies plummet to lowest point since 2017: StatCan
item.description: New data from Statistics Canada suggests there may be more people looking for work than there are jobs available as many businesses report not feeling a need to hire more.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Wildlife photographer helps save elk trapped in netting in Prince Albert National Park
item.description: Avid wildlife photographer Rod Young reported a bull elk in distress to Prince Albert National Park staff, who then tranquilized the animal and freed it from the man-made netting.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Brad Marchand comes home to support a grieving N.S. coach and friend
item.description: The Florida Panthers forward, who is from Hammonds Plains, N.S., made a surprise appearance at a minor hockey game in Halifax on Wednesday night. Marchand said he didn't hesitate to come home once he learned his friend's 10-year-old daughter died after a battle with cancer.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Carney tours newly completed South Korean sub as Canada weighs multi-billion dollar order
item.description: South Korea's prime minister put his political weight behind his country's multi-billion dollar bid to sell Canada submarines. Kim Min-seok accompanied his Canadian counterpart, Mark Carney, on a tour of the Hanwha Ocean Ltd. yard ahead of the APEC summit.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: MPs urge Carney government to release special agency governing documents
item.description: Opposition MPs are calling on Prime Minister Mark Carney’s government to make public the documents that govern three special agencies it has created to manage billions of dollars for major projects, defence procurement and the construction of affordable homes.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Wait for core Ontario autism services tops 5 years: advocates
item.description: When Ashley Ferreira's five-year-old son was diagnosed with autism in 2020 she never imagined that a five-year for him to get access to government-funded core therapies.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: 1 minute of silence: Inside the Quebec ER that cared for abandoned newborn who died
item.description: A team of doctors ending and starting their shifts at a Longueuil, Que., hospital spent an hour trying to resuscitate a newborn that was abandoned at a bus shelter in the early hours of Monday.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: O Canada! Summer tourism numbers hit all-time high
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Canadians are delaying long-term goals to keep up with cost of living: data
item.description: Canadians say it's getting more challenging to save for the future because of the economy and high cost of living, according to new survey data.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Zellers aims to make ‘cultural comeback' as first store reopens in Edmonton
item.description: Iconic Canadian retailer Zellers returns with a new Edmonton store, blending nostalgia with modern design and curated apparel, home, and lifestyle goods.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Young, proud, online: Quebec's newest sovereigntists hope to revive an aging movement
item.description: The self-described CEO of the next generation of Quebec sovereigntists is a 17-year-old rapper and TikTok sensation who claims to be more influential than Premier François Legault.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Photos: Electronic powerhouses Kaytranada and Justice co-headline Rogers Arena
item.description: The DJ and the French duo combined for a memorable show.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Why the Canadian sport system is in financial disarray
item.description: Limited government funding is among many factors contributing to the state of financial disarray currently embroiling Canadian sport. As a result, National Sports Organizations have had to significantly tighten their belts, making cuts and slashing expenses wherever possible.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Energy minister hints at support for carbon capture in climate strategy, no mention of emissions cap
item.description: Ahead of the release of Prime Minister Mark Carney’s climate competitiveness strategy, his energy minister offered some hints of what will be included when it's introduced in Tuesday’s budget.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: This Alberta mountain town plays a big role in the fitness watch craze
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Alberta labour leaders gauge interest in general strike after suspension of teachers' bargaining rights
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Residents prepared for a fight as golf course developer eyes Cape Breton park
item.description: Some in Cape Breton are angry and preparing to fight as a nearby golf course developer eyes the windswept beaches of West Mabou Beach Provincial Park.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Helping Quebec non-profits below ‘cybersecurity poverty line' strengthen networks
item.description: Facing the threat of cyberattacks and with limited budgets, non-profit organizations across Quebec are being offered free cybersecurity consulting sessions.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator
